div.p: The 2-digit SSA state code where the durable medical equipment (DME) supplier was located; used by the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) for pricing the service. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dmerclineprcngstatecd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

description.value: The 2-digit SSA state code where the durable medical equipment (DME) supplier was located; used by the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) for pricing the service. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dmerc_line_prcng_state_cd
